# Videos folder

Place your background hero video here as `hero.mp4`.

Recommended settings:
- Format: MP4 (H.264), Web Optimized
- Orientation: 16:9 landscape (1280x720 or 1920x1080)
- Duration: 8–15s loop, muted
- Bitrate: ~2–4 Mbps (720p) or 4–8 Mbps (1080p)

Optional poster file: `hero-poster.jpg` to show while loading.

If you use different names, update the `src/App.tsx` video `src` and `poster` attributes accordingly.
